bilingual.source: This is a programme run by The Gorilla Organization.
bilingual.target: 这是由大猩猩组织运行的项目。

bilingual.source: The Gorilla Organization works on gorilla conservation projects.
bilingual.target: 大猩猩组织从事大猩猩保护项目。

bilingual.source: The World Health Organization is an important international organization.
bilingual.target: 世界卫生组织是一个重要的国际组织。
基地组织是一个恐怖组织。

bilingual.source: After the merger, the organization restructured its management team.
bilingual.target: 合并后，组织重新组织了管理团队。
她加入了一个志愿者组织。
这个组织机构有很多部门。

bilingual.source: The Organization Department will be responsible for organizing this event.
bilingual.target: 组织部将负责此次活动的组织工作。
该组织授予她一笔奖学金。

bilingual.source: They decided to found a new organization.
bilingual.target: 他们决定创立一个新的组织。

yingyinNormal.en: Solid information, a secret terrorist organization is planning an attack.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可靠情报，秘密恐怖组织正在策划一场袭击。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you know if there is a Jewish organization? I'd be surprised if there isn't. There's a Jewish organization for everything. Not that illiteracy is a very Jewish problem.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你听说过这类犹太人组织吗？没有才怪。犹太人什么组织都有。尽管文盲并不是犹太人专有的问题。

yingyinNormal.en: I was thinking maybe an organization to encourage literacy. Good. Good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许可以捐给一个提倡扫除文盲的组织。很好，很好。

yingyinNormal.en: A dark force is growing. A criminal organization known as the Foot Clan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 黑暗的力量正在崛起，一个被人民称為"大脚帮"的犯罪组织 。

yingyinNormal.en: When you find a cancer in an organization, you must cut it out before it can spread.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当你在组织里发现了一枚毒瘤，必须得在它扩散前尽早切除。

yingyinNormal.en: IMF suspects this to be the same shadow organization you have been tracking for the last year also known as the Syndicate. IMF would be right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 碟中谍小组怀疑这个组织与你去年一直在追查的那个是同一个秘密组织，也就是所谓的辛迪加，碟中谍小组猜对了。

yingyinNormal.en: I work for an organization whose primary purpose is not space travel. It's reshaping wrongdoings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我所工作的组织，其主首要目标不是探索太空而是修正历史错误。

yingyinNormal.en: I was sent undercover to earn Lane's trust, and eventually identify the members of his organization.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我被秘密派遣来获得莱恩的信任，并且最终指认这个组织的成员们。

yingyinNormal.en: These are no accidents. They're links in a chain. The work of a single organization, the Syndicate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那些都绝非偶然，它们由某个组织策划，环环相扣，这些都是辛迪加的杰作。

yingyinNormal.en: Jane, I work for a new organization seeking young women, like yourself, to train in a career in government service.
yingyinNormal.zh: 简，我为一个新组织工作，在寻找像你这样的年轻女士培训后为政府服务。

yingyinNormal.en: Those stolen NYPD files contain every member of Elias' organization, his business associates, and the structure of his operation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那些被偷走的纽约警局文件中有全部以利亚组织的成员名单，生意伙伴以及运作架构。

yingyinNormal.en: So we're staying vigilant. And we're moving ahead with our strategy to degrade and ultimately destroy this terrorist organization.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此，我们要保持警惕。而且我们也正在实施我们的战略，逐步打击直至完全消灭这一恐怖组织。

yingyinNormal.en: We're lucky to be allowed in, the Yanomami are nervous of outsiders and the organization that protects them insists visitors have vaccinations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们能进来也属走运，雅诺玛米人对外来者很是紧张，保护他们的组织也要求来访者接种疫苗。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: This would support your suspicion that a shadow organization is committed to inciting revolution, by enabling acts of terror in nations friendly to Western interests.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这也印证了你之前的怀疑，有一个秘密组织在那些对西方利益集团交好的国家中通过恐怖主义行动来煽动革命。

yingyinNormal.en: It states, that the Avengers shall no longer be a private organization. Instead, they'll operate under the supervision of a United Nations Panel, only when and if that Panel deems it necessary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其中写明：复仇者联盟不再是私人组织，而是要在一个联合国小组的监督下行动，且是否出动要由该小组决定。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Chairman, the so call Impossible Missions Force is not just a rogue organization, it is an outdated one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 主席先生，这个所谓的碟中谍小组不仅肆意妄为，而且观念过时。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just thankful to god For this opportunity to be able to come out here And play with this team and this organization.
yingyinNormal.zh: 感谢神赐予我这次上场的机会来为这支球队打球

yingyinNormal.en: And what you're planning to do what with that? Sue. Who? Her. Her organization. For what? Well, that's where you come in. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后怎样？你打算怎么做？起诉。起诉谁？她，和她所属的机构。告什么？找你就是为了这个。

yingyinNormal.en: To keep everything running smoothly requires precision organization, compared to the bustle outside, the railway bureau control center is an oasis of calm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只有进行精密的运营，春运才能顺畅进行，和车站外面的喧闹相比，铁路局控制中心就像一片平静的绿洲。

yingyinNormal.en: Think of any product, any organization, or any person you know, and you will see that this is true for them. Evolution is simply a process of either adapting, or dying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想想任何产品，机构，你认识的人，你就会看到确实如此。进化只不过是适者生存。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Both France and the United States are involved in the <highlight>organization</highlight>'s work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国和美国都参与了该组织的工作。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>Organization</highlight> for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) is currently working with 131 countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经济合作与发展组织目前正与131个国家合作。

examination_example.sentence: It requires a remarkable degree of vision, as well as cooperation between city authorities, the private sector, community groups and cultural <highlight>organisations</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这需要非凡的远见，以及市政当局、私营部门、社区团体和文化组织之间的合作。

examination_example.sentence: Court, school, <highlight>organizations</highlight> of amateurs, and the traveling actors were all rivals in supplying a widespread desire for dramatic entertainment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法庭、学校、业余爱好者组织和旅行演员都是竞争对手，他们为戏剧娱乐提供了广泛的需求。

examination_example.sentence: Qualified multilingual youngsters from other countries are proving to have a competitive advantage over their British counterparts in global companies and <highlight>organisations</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在全球公司和组织中，来自其他国家的合格的多语种年轻人正在证明他们比其英国同行具有竞争优势。

examination_example.sentence: The Biotechnology Industry <highlight>Organisation</highlight> (BIO), a trade group, assured members that this was just a "preliminary step" in a longer battle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 贸易组织生物技术产业组织（BIO）向其成员保证，这只是一场长期斗争的“前奏”。

examination_example.sentence: We ascribe meanings to texts on the basis of interaction between kinds of <highlight>organization</highlight> or patterning we perceive in a text's formal structures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们基于在文本的形式结构中感知到的各种组织和模式之间的相互作用来赋予文本意义。

examination_example.sentence: Here, too, the problems are social: the <highlight>organization</highlight> and distribution of food, wealth and prosperity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这里的问题也是社会性的：食物、财富和繁荣的组织和分配。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: We were informed about our semester (学期) project of volunteering at a non-profit <highlight>organization</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们得知，我们的学期项目是在一个非营利组织做志愿者。

examination_example.sentence: A successful swap depends on the selection of clothes, the <highlight>organization</highlight> of the event, and, obviously, how much fun is had.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个成功的交换取决于衣服的选择，活动的组织，以及，显然，有多少乐趣。

examination_example.sentence: It's an amazing accomplishment and one we cannot achieve without generous support from individuals, corporations, and other social <highlight>organizations</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一项惊人的成就，如果没有个人、公司和其他社会组织的慷慨支持，我们就不可能实现这一成就。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 去动词化的抽象名词后缀, 表示"行为, 过程, 结果"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Todd wisely decided to build Free Library as a non-profit <highlight>organization</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 托德明智地决定将免费图书馆建立为一个非营利组织。

examination_example.sentence: This is the way the charity <highlight>organization</highlight> Heifer International (国际小母牛慈善组织) wants to end world hunger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是国际小母牛慈善组织希望结束世界饥饿的方式。

examination_example.sentence: At least 75 animal welfare(福利)<highlight>organizations</highlight> have been set up in America.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国至少成立了75个动物福利组织。
